chapter.title: Developers
chapter.para: This chapter describes the build structure of jbpm for developers.

section.title: The ant build targets
section.para: jBPM is being developed with ant 1.6.2.

section.title: Building the docs
section.para: Building the docs requires a separate module to be put besides the jbpm.3 home directory: docbook-support. This module can be found in the public jboss anonymous accessible cvs repository : TODO
